text:
[Section: Page 232 of 1048]



Boys ATT- You know bills have phone numbers. You pay the bills. Can you share with kids?
Boys Xfinity- Should I share YouTube showing how it works?. They promote this, not spying.
Therapist- What should I do to be sure that we get reimbursed? Do I do it or do you, and for who?Job Plans- Shared a thread yesterday. We agree it
would help. Not possible in the status quo.
Beth Check- It's here somewhere in the mess. I'll locate and move to BofA- Xmas gift/Bend trip
Alki- Went down pretty well, pointed out the obvious. Will pay for trash removal. Refund possible.
Spring Break- I think we wait till after Dr Brown to have a realistic discussion about the options.
Please let me know what I am missing or what you would change. This is probably 100k and a calendar year for the attorneys...hmmmmm....
Message 918 of 4024
Sorry... that was passive aggressive.
Please accept my apology. It’s counterproductive
Sent:02/01/2024 at 12:56 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/01/2024 at 01:02 PM)
Subject:Re: Dr Brown
Message 919 of 4024
Agree it’s a big list.
Stepping back, we are in this situation based on actions you took so I do take issue with frustration based on fact that there are real downstream
impacts for actions I could not control.
I’ll need to circle back on how we can connect.
The tone below feels very confrontational which makes me wary of jumping on a call or engaging in any type of discussion.
Sent:02/01/2024 at 01:02 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/01/2024 at 01:02 PM)
Subject:Re: Communication
Message 920 of 4024
I’m not being confrontational at all. And have accepted my part.
Please just choose the bullets you would like to discuss and let’s Teams
I will not be negative! It’s just piling up on us so I want to address hot items.
Sent:02/01/2024 at 01:05 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/01/2024 at 01:16 PM)
Subject:Re: Communication

Message 921 of 4024
I accept your feedback and will respond accordingly so we work together in a positive way
How's this look?
- Running List- Thanks for speaking with Anna Lisa
- Adrian- What can we do to help him out ASAP
- SAAS- Do we wait till the running list discussion?
- Lugg- I agree. Let's do this. What do you need?
- Dr Brown- What does success look like for us?
- Xfinity, ATT, and Bofa- Are we on the same page
- SoberLink- Should be on track. Are we good now?
Please let me know if there's anything else you would like to address, we can adjust.
Looking forward to a quick, productive, and positive sync so we can make a dent!
best
robert
Sent:02/01/2024 at 01:20 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/01/2024 at 02:59 PM)
Subject:Re: Communication
Message 922 of 4024
Hey-
I forwarded you a message on AAU camp for Winter Break in Hotmail, so you have context but am following up here for the discussion. I'd like to
get him back to Shoot 360. I hope it is just like his other basketball activities so does not present an issue. And am even hopeful that Dr Brown
provides an acceptable framework all up. I'd like to at least get him signed up before it fills up.
Here is the relevant info that would apply to him paired down:

- Advanced Group (6th-HS) : 9:00 AM - 12:00 PM
- February 20th - February  23rd
- Shoot360, 10842 117th Pl NE
- Kirkland, WA 98033 Camp
- Cost:  Advance Full Week - $225
thanks!

I have not connected with AnnaLisa but let’s do a quick teams at 3:30 on a very exceptional basis to get through our critical list. I am making it very
clear this is to move some critical items forward and there is no expectation for any future connects like this.
My proposal will be we have a mediator involved  on prearranged discussion if one is needed in the future if approved.
Sent:02/01/2024 at 03:04 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/01/2024 at 03:04 PM)
Subject:Re: Communication
Message 926 of 4024
I’m fine with that. And frankly, if I am twisting your arm, I’ll withdraw the ask. I was trying to help but realize that right now there is a lot of tension.
Please don’t do it if you feel like I am controlling you.
And to be clear again, I asked for a team’s call because it seems like it may help. I am not trying to violate our RO and am never going to try and use
this if we choose against you. You’re being a good parent.
I’ll send the running link invite to you.

see attached for things I can explain to you.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VqGo_6HunBE
We are fighting over things I can show you with your own eyes. This means everything. Cams, Wi-Fi, Phones... We're at each other's throats and don't
need to be. I can answer your questions. Not just you, but the kids too. If we pause, I really can just demonstrate EVERY single thing I have said
Please consider it. Let's take control back..

separate alerts for what really is probably the same phone. Anyway, I’m here for ya if I can help debug at all. For that matter I can meet you there, let
them fix and test on the spot. Then we know it’s resolved.

Message 931 of 4024
I was thinking about this a bit more. I can either have a deck and links, or we can go through each of these three things together on the fly. We can
start with you and me, or with the kids. We can do it on my phone, laptop, or your phone, laptop.
Or I can put it on the big screen if you like. I will take any special request you like and accommodate. We can use either of our accounts or both.
There is nothing to set up or can or set up ahead of time. It's all real and legit because ... it is.
Sent:02/01/2024 at 07:26 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/02/2024 at 06:59 AM)
Subject:Re: As We Discussed

I just want to teach you and show you. Just like the kids did at Christina's house for the internet safety course they took. I hate hearing Max and
Adrain are scared when it is something we can fix right away with just a few demos and Q&A.
This is super important because:

We are putting so much time, energy, and money into this, including the cycles through the attorneys. And that seems to have put a halt on all the
things we were trying to wrap up. It has to be worth an hour of our time to be able to put this to bed and put the kids at ease again....
We really can solve this before we even start another week!
Message 932 of 4024
Let me know what you think. I'd like to keep this moving and get it to them before the weekend.
Realistically this does put pressure on you and I, to work out you and I, but I know we can do that.
best
robert
Sent:02/01/2024 at 08:25 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/02/2024 at 06:59 AM)
Subject:SAAS email has been sent for your review
Message 933 of 4024
This all sounds good. Let me sleep on it as well. Also, since we are trying to clear your headspace, if something is in your way that you really don't
want to see, let me know and I'll see if it just makes sense to move it over (I just don't know what those things could be really?). I think we also have a
plan for Sonos (thanks) and Peloton.
The thing that would honestly help me the most, is have you look at my place and think about unused accent pieces that work. That was your jam
and I know we have some extra (old hallway painting? ) I need stuff to put out, not hide away. But I don't want "Big & Little together forever" stuff
and hope we can just store for now.
A pretty productive day, Christine. Especially the Teams call where learned to threaten but back off quickly..lol. I hope we maintain now that we
have seen what rock bottom looks like. We both want a path to mental health and normalcy... But uou won't send to Anna Lisa if I point out how
well we get along when we need to, right ?
Have a great night. Thanks again for the teamwork...

No worries. I actually have that issue about 25% of the time on OFW. In general, since this all began, it seems tech has not been our friend
unfortunately.
I am open to a mutually agreed protocol for urgent or emergency situations. This was not one. But if there is one, we need a better way to
communicate.
Technically you can unblock me and we know I won’t use it because of the RO. But if AD has an issue at school (example) I could. What would you
suggest?
Sent:02/02/2024 at 08:54 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/02/2024 at 09:32 AM)
Subject:Re: Sync Tonight
Message 945 of 4024
Hope you are ok with the investment decisions I’m making. I’ve been very deliberate since July and spend time on this while I am unemployed.
I trimmed back on losers I wanted to see rebound (ARK, AMD). I was being stubborn. I’m focused on stocks I believe are best for the next 6-12
months.
That said, we still have a good chunk of Tesla I’m not comfortable with. It’s not like a real stock. It behaves like a Musk popularity contest. Still tbd
there.
But loser sales have funded bills and should help offset capital gains we see as we transition to selling some of the winners. I think it’s a win-win
though?
I realize penning this, how I miss our intellectual connection. Between that and booty, we eliminated our most electric/satisfying connections. I
digress..
Please let me know if you have questions or concerns. I’d be happy to consider input or feedback if you want to consider a more conservative position
right now.
Including Vanguard as well as fyi..

I am starting this in OFW per the RO.

For the meeting, thanks. I still would far prefer to do this face-to-face. It will be a much better way to build rapport with them and that is important.

Lori Metcalf <lmetcalf@seattleacademy.org>
9:33AM (9 minutes ago)
to me, Christine
Hi Christine and Rob,
Hearing that Max and your family are having a great experience at SAAS is wonderful. I am happy to set up a Zoom call for the three of us to discuss
Adrian joining us at SAAS.
In the meantime, I strongly encourage you to complete the Ravenna application for Adrian so the process can start as soon as possible. We cannot
make enrollment decisions without an application, and we will need it regardless of a midyear transfer or entry next year. The sooner the application is
complete, the better.
I am available for a Zoom call next Thursday between 8:00 and 11:30 or Friday between 12:30 and 4:00. Would either work for you?
Thanks
Lori

Chief Outreach and Enrollment Officer | SEATTLE ACADEMY
Email: lmetcalf@seattleacademy.org
Direct: (206) 676-6899
christine moyer

Friday anytime between noon and two

9:40AM (2 minutes ago)
to Christine
First- how do you and I coordinate our thoughts and plans consistent with the true spirit of the RO? You lead, I’ll follow.
Second- let’s jam out the request today. I want to be responsive and timely. Then let’s agree on a time and send a response that captures both in a
single email and also asks if we can do this in person.
WRT the impending divorce, it’s not our friend in this discussion so I’d prefer that we appear to be a happy, well adjusted family. That way it does
not look like ADs issue is really home life, and not ICS.
If that is controversial to you, let’s move to OFW to discuss.

I’m comfortable with you responding if you could add some language to reference the application already completed for the school year.
I don’t think a teams call is needs for us to align.

Hey-
I’m trying to figure out how we do this for Max and even me. The Vyvanse is over 1k name brand w/o insurance and around $450 with. I know that
caused a stink before with us.
But I know Max just recently had his Rx filled so I am wondering how we did that because the generic has not been available for sometime and it will
help me decide how I do it too.
And side note, I’m hoping that by coming off your Starbucks insurance as you asked, and moving to something else I don’t have a worse plan where I
have to pick that cost up.
Let me know your thoughts. It’s a big number and between Max and I we could be talking about ~1k-2k a month so while it might seem like a
frivolous ask, I think it’s important to agree on.
Thanks!

Sent:02/02/2024 at 01:16 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/02/2024 at 03:58 PM)
Subject:Re: ADHD- Max’s Vyvanse
Message 960 of 4024
So the way I I make sure Max feels safe but welcome is we chat a bit to catch up. And then I will offer something to do together like this "Hey, I know
you probably already have plans, but if they fall through, I'd love to XYZ with you, so just let me know" He always does but at least he knows the
offer is there and I'm thinking of him.
I'd like to do the same for AD this afternoon to shoot some hoops here. It is gorgeous and would be fun. Just so you are aware, he and I have been
having some deep, AD lead conversations- Cabo, Whistler, Hawaii, and Vegas. We have touched them all. He wants me to understand the impact it
has had on him, and know why I did that.
Every time we go there, just like when he has asked me to blow, I am very positive and reassuring. I thank him sincerely for not turning his back on me
and loving me enough to have a difficult conversation that makes him feel uncomfortable. It is a true sign of unconditional love. I appreciate it and
want him to know I'm an open book.
So, with those things noted:
- Gorgeous day to shoot some hoops
- A safe way to bow out of an offer to play
- We are having important conversations
I'd like to see if he wants to shoot hoops for an hour. I take him to practice. You pick him up!
I don't see a down said but appreciate your concerns in advance. I hope you can find a way to let "us work on us" in a safe space (nothing safer and
more comfortable than a game of pig for me and him) in a small-time boxed opportunity until you and I have a longer discussion/explanation.
thanks!
Sent:02/02/2024 at 02:28 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/02/2024 at 03:58 PM)
Subject:Gorgeous Day: Dad & AD

Message 961 of 4024
I have been communicating just as normal since the message that I sent that scared AD and Max on Monday. And up until today, everything seemed
fine. But now I appear to be blocked on both of their phones. I can’t text them or call them. This is obviously giving me some major anxiety. Can you
let me know how we can talk quickly about this? It is a major concern for me.

From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/02/2024 at 03:58 PM)

From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/02/2024 at 04:03 PM)
Subject:Re: Gorgeous Day: Dad & AD

He has shared with me as well. See attached. We are having constructive conversations. I want to partner here as if I am actually his father. But I am
not allowed.
If we can have our conversation please. If you would please make learning what i am talking about a priority, we can speak with one voice again.
Adrian deserves an explanation for what he saw. I saw the exact same thing- mom in the garage in the app. And I want to show you how/why. Please
let me.
Let’s not put our head in the sand for another week please. There is nothing wrong with me showing the real world experience so you both
understand.
Please work with me, Christine.
